comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: BenjaminPH on October 25, 2022, 09:49:09 AMGot everything as agreedI have been holding funds in escrow on behalf of BenjaminPH to purchase an AWS Credit from Mkadmi.  The deal has fallen through and I've been asked to refund the funds to BenjaminPH.  Just to make sure everything is on the up and up, I am posting here publicly to let everyone know (even though this is a necro bump) that these two users were unable to complete a transaction and the funds are being returned to the buyer.  If anyone has any issues with this or suspects foul play of some sort, speak now or forever hold your peace.  Both parties have requested the refund so I will be processing it unless someone brings up an issue.
